mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recipe (recipeno, memberno, prompt, content, rdate) VALUES (recipe_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memberno}, #{prompt}, #{content}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT recipeno, memberno, prompt, content, rdate FROM recipe WHERE memberno = #{memberno} ORDER BY recipeno DESC
